title: Jim Beam logo
content:
Doing a job for Beam, and while I have the logo, I just need something similar to the Jim beam part for other materials used in this job. Parts of it look like Latin, but I can’t find anything with the exact style of serifs.  
Doesn’t have to match perfectly as I think it was drawn about 150 years ago!! Just close!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [JIMMY.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064541/http:/typophile.com/files/JIMMY.jpg) | 40.79 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Just add water" contemporary sans - Neo Sans {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064541/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20402 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fitness Concepts logo- Blockit {Sebastian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064541/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20394 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dunnyman

comments.content: Probably a custom logo but close to Latin Bold Condensed
